Text:
Dutch only.  No alternative language options.  Easy to install and patch even if you don't speak Dutch but not very enjoyable to play ... even with a translator.  

Note:  This game *kills* my RAM.  I have 1GB.  TrendMicro PC-cillin says that the downloaded folder contains spyware but does not identify the specific file path.

Gaan er nog mensen seeden?

Activatie-crack er in?

this can be in english..... just download the patch from this torrent then go here http://www.bubble-bobble-games.com/yahtzee-game.htm and download the trail version then just install the patch as would normal and bang it works!
